languages.text: "Власть развращает, но в руках Данрока еще и ваша казна, Лорд-капитан. Сегодня он верен вам, а завтра золото затуманит ему мозги. Тот, кто продает и покупает, рано или поздно начинает на всем видеть ценники".

"Lord Captain, power corrupts, but Danrok also controls your treasury. He may be loyal to you today, but sooner or later, the gold will cloud his judgement. It does not take long for the one who buys and sells to start seeing price tags attached to everything."
languages.original_text: "Власть развращает, но в руках Данрока еще и ваша казна, Лорд-капитан. Сегодня он верен вам, а завтра золото затуманит ему мозги. Тот, кто продает и покупает, рано или поздно начинает на всем видеть ценники".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, power corrupts, but Danrok also controls your treasury. He may be loyal to you today, but sooner or later the gold will cloud his judgment. It does not take long for the one who buys and sells to start seeing price tags attached to everything."

"Lord Captain, power corrupts, but Danrok also controls your treasury. He may be loyal to you today, but sooner or later, the gold will cloud his judgement. It does not take long for the one who buys and sells to start seeing price tags attached to everything."

languages.text: « Il est bien connu que le pouvoir corrompt, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais Danrok contrôle également votre trésorerie. Sa loyauté vous est peut-être acquise aujourd'hui, mais tôt ou tard, l'or voilera son jugement. Celui qui achète et vend a très vite tendance à mettre un prix sur tout. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, power corrupts, but Danrok also controls your treasury. He may be loyal to you today, but sooner or later, the gold will cloud his judgement. It does not take long for the one who buys and sells to start seeing price tags attached to everything."

traits.locale_text: « Il est bien connu que le pouvoir corrompt, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais Danrok contrôle également votre trésorerie. Sa loyauté vous est peut-être acquise aujourd'hui, mais tôt ou tard, l'or voilera son jugement. Celui qui achète et vend a très vite tendance à mettre un prix sur tout. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, el poder corrompe, pero Danrok también controla su tesorería. Puede que hoy le sea leal, pero, tarde o temprano, el oro obnubilará su juicio. La persona encargada de la compra y la venta no tarda demasiado en ver precios en todas partes».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, power corrupts, but Danrok also controls your treasury. He may be loyal to you today, but sooner or later, the gold will cloud his judgement. It does not take long for the one who buys and sells to start seeing price tags attached to everything."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, el poder corrompe, pero Danrok también controla su tesorería. Puede que hoy le sea leal, pero, tarde o temprano, el oro obnubilará su juicio. La persona encargada de la compra y la venta no tarda demasiado en ver precios en todas partes».

languages.text: “舰长大人，权力会腐化一个人。不仅如此，丹罗克还掌控着您的国库。或许他现在对您忠诚不二，但金子迟早会蒙蔽他的判断力。用不了多久，这个负责所有买卖事务的人，就会把身边的一切贴上价格的标签。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, power corrupts, but Danrok also controls your treasury. He may be loyal to you today, but sooner or later, the gold will cloud his judgement. It does not take long for the one who buys and sells to start seeing price tags attached to everything."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，权力会腐化一个人。不仅如此，丹罗克还掌控着您的国库。或许他现在对您忠诚不二，但金子迟早会蒙蔽他的判断力。用不了多久，这个负责所有买卖事务的人，就会把身边的一切贴上价格的标签。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、権力は腐敗するものです。しかし、ダンロックは国庫も支配している。今はあなたに対して忠誠かもしれませんが、遅かれ早かれ、金によって判断が鈍るでしょう。売り買いをする者が、何にでも値札をつけるようになるのに、そう時間はかからないでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, power corrupts, but Danrok also controls your treasury. He may be loyal to you today, but sooner or later, the gold will cloud his judgement. It does not take long for the one who buys and sells to start seeing price tags attached to everything."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、権力は腐敗するものです。しかし、ダンロックは国庫も支配している。今はあなたに対して忠誠かもしれませんが、遅かれ早かれ、金によって判断が鈍るでしょう。売り買いをする者が、何にでも値札をつけるようになるのに、そう時間はかからないでしょう」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, Macht korrumpiert, doch Danrok kontrolliert auch Eure Schatzkammer. Heute mag er Euch loyal sein, doch früher oder später wird das Gold sein Urteilsvermögen trüben. Es dauert meist nicht lange, bis der, der für Kauf und Verkauf zuständig ist, an allem und jeden ein Preisschild sieht."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, power corrupts, but Danrok also controls your treasury. He may be loyal to you today, but sooner or later, the gold will cloud his judgement. It does not take long for the one who buys and sells to start seeing price tags attached to everything."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, Macht korrumpiert, doch Danrok kontrolliert auch Eure Schatzkammer. Heute mag er Euch loyal sein, doch früher oder später wird das Gold sein Urteilsvermögen trüben. Es dauert meist nicht lange, bis der, der für Kauf und Verkauf zuständig ist, an allem und jeden ein Preisschild sieht."

languages.text: "Güç kişiyi yozlaştırır ancak Danrok, aynı zamanda hazinenizi de kontrol ediyor Lord Kaptan. Bugün size sadık olabilir ama altın, er ya da geç muhakeme yeteneğini bulanıklaştıracaktır. Alım satım işleri yapan birinin her şeyin üzerinde fiyat etiketi görmeye başlaması uzun sürmez."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, power corrupts, but Danrok also controls your treasury. He may be loyal to you today, but sooner or later, the gold will cloud his judgement. It does not take long for the one who buys and sells to start seeing price tags attached to everything."
